title: How do I pick chroma in new champ select
body: I was playing lee sin in new champ select mode scrolled over dragon fist and it didn't give me an option to select a chroma color, I assume I'm just missing something

replies.body:
Hey Elsburry,

You aren't able to select chromas or ward skins in the new champion select - it's [one of several known issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select). We're looking to get this resolved in Patch 6.2.
Really glad to hear it's just a bug and not riot's decision to just disable a feature that people payed money into. I was getting worried.
Definitely not! We still had a few kinks to work out and didn't want to ship it completely broken. D: Next patch you should see it resolved!
Better to ship it just a little bit broken!
Thanks for the reply, glad to know it'll be fixed soon.
